Name: Sally
Text: Alright buster, you're getting put away.

Name: Dr Deficit
Text: Simple empirical evidence. Banktania was helped in!

Name: William
Text: Is this why all the regions were forced to downsize their bases?

Name: Sally
Text: Is that why Banktania invaded Finance first? To hide the budget?

Name: Dr Deficit
Text: No time to publish a paper on this. Engineering and Nursing are in trouble.

Name: Sally
Text: Let's go, time to be heroes!
